trustfund: TF021946-BRAZILIAN RAIN FOREST (ADMINISTRATIVE),TF026655-CEC DEMONSTRATION PROJECTS,TF026659-RFT DEMONSTRATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The outcome of the Rain Forest
            Demonstration Projects (Type A) for Brazil was satisfactory
            with likely sustainability, substantial institutional
            development impact and satisfactory performances by both the
            Bank and the Borrower.  The project, part of the twelve
            planned for the Pilot Program to Conserve the Brazilian Rain
            Forests (RFPP), was to contribute to the trial, adaptation
            and dissemination of innovative, promising and sustainable
            development approaches.  Lessons were learned in the areas
            of: pilot projects, integration of local knowledge,
            technical assistance, planning processes, selection
            processes, size of projects, natural resource management,
            awareness of stakeholders, project sustainability,
            partnerships with both local institutions and the private
            section, agroforestry systems, extractivism of forest
            products, and community-driven development.
